text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Splendid! It seems like you're steadily collecting trophies!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Ha-ha-ha! Just as I expected of you!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Many thanks! We're one step closer to my boundless dream!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: However! The present amount of trophies is not enough to fill this room with brilliance!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Continue on! I'm counting on you to keep up the good work!
